quest.name: Dark Water
journal: Ansger is worried about the village's water supply.
objectives: Slay three dust anilas for their cores.
Deliver the anila cores to Ansger.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: Good eveningmorningday, lasslad. You look like you can hold your own in a fight. Would you mind lending me a hand?

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: Once upon a time, Ala Gannha was known for its quarry and the stone it produced. However, a string of problems combined to put an end to that. One such problem facing us right now concerns the local water supply.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: Quarrying requires huge amounts of water─which becomes awfully dirty in the process. Should this water find its way into the reservoir next to the village, we'd lose our only source of clean drinking water.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: Although, if we had an anila core or two─make that three─we could easily purify the water.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: I'd like you to slay three dust anilas and bring back their cores. You should find some to the south.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: I'd like you to slay three dust anilas and bring back their cores. You should find some to the south.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: Did you manage to get three cores?

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: Brilliant! These will help us to remove any mineral dust from the water we use when quarrying.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: In the days before the Empire invaded, the entire village used to go out on anila hunts together to collect their cores. We just don't have the bodies for it now that half of Ala Gannha has been absorbed into the imperial army.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: That's not to say we'd have any business even if there were more people around. Garlemald only uses metal for its buildings.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: Never mind that anyway. Thanks for your help, lasslad. It's much appreciated.
